Attributes.description: Stakeholder practices: stakeholder engagement, public consultation, partnerships, stakeholder management, buy-in. Project delivery: project delivery options, public-private partnerships (P3), integrated project delivery (IPD), partnering. Modelling, analytical methods, and decision support: economic and risk modelling.
Attributes.coreq: Co-reqs: (STAT 251 or equivalent course in elementary statistics, CIVL 403 or equivalent course in Engineering Eceonomics.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:30, Building: Orchard, Room: Commons
